ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, I do own Velious - turns out that in 640 x 480 mode you just don t get that feature. I switched my display mode to 800 x 600 and hit I and
ygData.messageBody:
Comment added below:
--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...>
wrote:
> If you haven't purchased Velious - you will
> flip to "low-rez" every time you
> go to inventory (and will always do so for
> spell book). Optionally
> (stay-in-same-resolution of some such) -you
> will get the small border thing
> you see when you first change modes.
>
> With Velious they have a much improved
> Inventory Interface where you get an
> overlay screen - it's very nice.
>
> Slyde
>

Actually, I do own Velious - turns out that in
640 x 480 mode you just don't get that feature. I
switched my display mode to 800 x 600 and hit "I"
and everything is fine now. I'd like to switch it
to an even better resolution, but all the text
and spell gems are just too tiny in any other
mode!! Does anyone know if you can change the
text color of the inventory screen though? The
white letters are murderous in Velious =) or any
light colored area. I guess my next step is to
invest in a 19" or 21" monitor now! eh?



=====
Kinrea Keres 45th Teir'dal Warrior
<Chaotic Horde>
Sinarya L'achesis 25th Teir'dal Necromancer
Lereny 13th Half elf Bard
Zyrrah 7th Teir'dal Cleric
Saryrn Server
